ai.summary: A brief, easy 0.3 km walk along the Illogan FP 11 footpath in the United Kingdom. Ideal for a quick outdoor outing suitable for most ages and fitness levels.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat and well-maintained path with occasional grassy edges and short paved sections. May be muddy after rain; wear shoes with good grip.
ai.safety_notes: - Stay on the public right of way and plan around weather. - Check daylight hours and be prepared for changes in UK weather. - Wear suitable footwear and clothing for a short stroll on potentially uneven surfaces. - Bring a bottle of water, a charged phone, and a basic map or GPS; know your route. - Be mindful of other walkers and any livestock on rural paths.
recommended_gear: Hat and sunscreen for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: All seasons are suitable; spring and summer offer the best weather, while autumn and winter require warmer clothing and rain protection.

seo.title: Illogan FP 11: Easy 0.3 km Footpath Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Illogan FP 11, a short and easy 0.3 km footpath walk in the UK. Flat terrain, simple safety tips, and gear for a quick outdoor stroll.
